Uses of Class
com.ingenico.direct.domain.ThreeDSecure

  • Packages that use ThreeDSecure 
    Package Description
    com.ingenico.direct.domain  

    • Uses of ThreeDSecure in com.ingenico.direct.domain

      Methods in com.ingenico.direct.domain that return ThreeDSecure 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ThreeDSecure CardPaymentMethodSpecificInput.getThreeDSecure()
      Object containing specific data regarding 3-D Secure
      ThreeDSecure ThreeDSecure.withAuthenticationAmount(Long value)
      Allows amount to be authenticated to be different from amount authorized.
      ThreeDSecure ThreeDSecure.withChallengeCanvasSize(String value)
      Dimensions of the challenge window that potentially will be displayed to the customer.
      ThreeDSecure ThreeDSecure.withChallengeIndicator(String value)
      Allows you to indicate if you want the customer to be challenged for extra security on this transaction.
      ThreeDSecure ThreeDSecure.withExemptionRequest(String value)
      In PSD2, the ExemptionRequest field is used by merchants requesting an exemption when not using authentication on a transaction, in order to keep the conversion up.
      ThreeDSecure ThreeDSecure.withExternalCardholderAuthenticationData(ExternalCardholderAuthenticationData value)
      Object containing 3D secure details.
      ThreeDSecure ThreeDSecure.withMerchantFraudRate(Integer value)
      Merchant fraud rate in the EEA (all EEA card fraud divided by all EEA card volumes) calculated as per PSD2 RTS Mastercard will not calculate or validate the merchant fraud score
      ThreeDSecure ThreeDSecure.withPriorThreeDSecureData(ThreeDSecureData value)
      Object containing data regarding the customer authentication that occurred prior to the current transaction
      ThreeDSecure ThreeDSecure.withRedirectionData(RedirectionData value)
      Object containing browser specific redirection related data
      ThreeDSecure ThreeDSecure.withSecureCorporatePayment(Boolean value)
      Indicates dedicated payment processes and procedures were used, potential secure corporate payment exemption applies Logically this field should only be set to yes if the acquirer exemption field is blank.
      ThreeDSecure ThreeDSecure.withSkipAuthentication(Boolean value)
      * true = 3D Secure authentication will be skipped for this transaction.
      ThreeDSecure ThreeDSecure.withSkipSoftDecline(Boolean value)
      * true = Soft Decline retry mechanism will be skipped for this transaction.
      Methods in com.ingenico.direct.domain with parameters of type ThreeDSecure 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Object containing specific data regarding 3-D Secure

      Object containing specific data regarding 3-D Secure
